quotes.quote: We judge ourselves by our intentions. And others by their actions.
Sometimes people do what they think is for the best, and their intentions are misinterpreted.
Our intention creates our reality.
It is intent which establishes one's consequential outcomes.
A purpose, an intention, a design, strikes everywhere even the careless, the most stupid thinker.
Every action or perceived inaction shapes credibility.
Hell is paved with good intentions, not with bad ones. All men mean well.
Although actions may speak louder than words, it is our intentions that reveal our soul.
The intention that man should be happy is not in the plan of Creation.
We know there is intention and purpose in the universe, because there is intention and purpose in us.
A gift consists not in what is done or given, but in the intention of the giver or doer.
Among the many arguments to be made against cultural revolutions is that they are monotonous in spirit and monomaniacal in intention.
Powerful words come with powerful intent. Where you have passion, strength, courage, and determination you can accomplish anything!
When a crowd rushes into your house without declaring its intention, it is, by definition, an invasion.
Choose your intention carefully and then practice holding your consciousness to it, so it becomes the guiding light in your life.
A glint of intention initiates the process of creation.
Every action has an impact, choose wisely the impact you want to have.
However glorious an action in itself, it ought not to pass for great if it be not the effect of wisdom and intention.
Intentionality fuels the master's journey. Every master is a master of vision.
Intention is the core of all conscious life. Conscious intention colors and moves everything.
Intention is an echo of a previous intent.
Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
The effect of dominance is not always the result of an intention to dominate.
Each decision we make, each action we take, is born out of an intention.
The life of every man is a diary in which he means to write one story, and writes another.
A good intention clothes itself with power.
Honor thy error as a hidden intention.
A man's intentions should be allowed in some respects to plead for his actions.
Only good intentions may not always translate into good results.
It is only with the heart that one can see rightly, everything essential is invisible to the eye.
When your intention is clear, so is the way.
When your intentions are pure, so too will be your success.
We call an intention good which is right in itself, but the action is good, not because it contains within it some good, but because it issues from a good intention.
The intention to live as long as possible isn't one of the mind's best intentions, because quantity isn't the same as quality.
The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the greatest intention.
Intention is one of the most powerful forces there is. What you mean when you do a thing will always determine the outcome. The law creates the world.
It is more Important to be of pure intention than of perfect action.
The smallest deed is better than the greatest intention.
Every journey begins with the first step of articulating the intention, and then becoming the intention.
The great things you intend to do some time must have a beginning if they are ever to be done, so begin something worthwhile today.
A good intention feeds no one.
Where we go is not determined by where we want to go.
Good intention bring success in everything you do. Intention is always supported by the universal energy because it's a vital ingredient for manifestation.
All that counts in life is intention.
When you say you agree to a thing in principle you mean that you have not the slightest intention of carrying it out in practice.
It is only those that live intentionally that can accomplish and come to the significance meant for them.
A good intention clothes itself with sudden power. When a god wishes to ride, any chip or pebble will bud and shoot out winged feet, and serve him for a horse.
Intentions compressed into words enfold magical power.
All great acts are ruled by intention. What you mean is what you get.
